name: Pegasus Services and IRCD
short_description: Pegasus Ircd + IRC Services, New Secure server offering new, fun modes and commands, samove, myhost and mynick, + addon Z type Services. Based on Bahamut, Unreal and Quarterdecks global stage Ircd.
